alumnis.name: Ana Rita Rebelo
alumnis.description: PhD in Computer Science, Non-Euclidean Spaces in Virtual Reality. Co-founder of eBreathie and Super Save
alumnis.testimony: As Director of the Projects Department during In-Nova's founding period, the most challenging but rewarding part of my role was leading a diverse team. Learning to navigate through different personalities and harness each person's strengths was a constant, mutual learning experience. In-Nova, from the very beggining, has been distinguished by its welcoming atmosphere, fostering creativity and innovation. It's an invaluable platform that has provided experiences that have perfectly complemented my academic career - such as teamwork, leadership and, of course, innovation.

alumnis.name: Ema Paulo
alumnis.description: Borgwarner's Global Team, Lean Product and Process Development
alumnis.testimony: In-Nova was a game-changer for my university journey! From Marketing Member to President, I not only gained hard skills but also learned how to manage teams. The lessons learnt from In-Nova are still visible, influencing how I approach challenges and find innovative solutions. Joining In-Nova is not just a step - it's a journey of personal and professional growth waiting for you.

alumnis.name: Vasco Matos
alumnis.description: Production Supervisor at Tabaqueira's Factory (Philip Morris)
alumnis.testimony: In-Nova allowed me to integrate multidisciplinary teams, develop work skills that I use on a daily basis and explore multiple business areas, allowing me to better understand my professional preferences. In-Nova was a differentiating factor when I entered the job market and made my adaptation to this new environment easier.
